Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for HemosIL CL HIT-IgG(PF4-H) chemiluminescent immunoassay for detecting anti-PF4/heparin IgG antibodies in citrated plasma on ACL TOP 970 CL analyzer.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative, fully automated chemiluminescent immunoassay for detection of IgG antibodies against Platelet Factor 4 complexed to heparin, aiding risk determination for heparin induced thrombocytopenia (HIT) in adult patients suspected of HIT, for use with human 3.2% citrated plasma on the ACL TOP 970 CL in a laboratory setting; result aids but does not exclude HIT and is for prescription use only.
